seller_description: The upgraded motion sensor under cabinet lights offer enhanced functionality with auto-on motion detection within 120° and 10ft in dark or low-light environments, automatically turning off after about 20 seconds of no movement. This eliminates the need to fumble for switches in the dark, preventing accidents. Additionally, these lights can be set to always-on mode for continuous use during the day or for tasks like reading, camping, or as a flashlight. Featuring 40 energy-efficient LEDs and a non-glare frosted cover, these dimmable lights offer 5 brightness levels, providing flexibility for both bright task lighting and softer night lighting without disturbing others. The lights are USB-C rechargeable with a built-in 1800mAh battery, offering up to 30 days of use in motion sensor mode or 8 hours in always-on mode at full brightness. With easy installation via strong magnets or adhesive metal plates, they’re perfect for use in the kitchen, closets, cupboards, pantry, basement, stairs, hallways, and more, with no need for an electrician.
review: I hosted a garage karaoke party, and these lights were the surprise stars of the evening! With motion sensor mode, it was like having automated stage lights. Every time someone stepped up to sing, the lights turned on dramatically—10/10 entertainment value.
Expected-output: Analyzing the provided images, the motion sensor lights deliver exactly what the seller advertises: a bright, customizable, and user-friendly lighting solution for various household needs. The reviews, despite their unrelated content, emphasize user satisfaction and the product’s adaptability. With features like auto-off timing and rechargeable batteries matching the seller's descriptions, these lights seem to exceed expectations by inspiring creative uses. There are no faults with the seller’s product or claims, as both align perfectly with the buyer’s real-world application and enjoyment.
label: -1 buyers opinion
